mapper.sql: id, log_user, uuid, access_date, start_time, end_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO history_access (log_user, uuid, access_date, start_time, end_time) VALUES (#{logUser}, #{uuid}, #{accessDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM history_access WHERE log_user = #{logUser} ORDER BY access_date DESC

SELECT
FROM history_access WHERE access_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY access_date DESC, log_user
